fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Create a factional chat. Except instead of a chat, you send an anonymous message to all town. You may include your name. Triggers instantly on use, you can use it once each day and twice each night.
- Use the Town FMK. Except, instead of an FMK, at the beginning of each night, you may choose to have all town players anonymously vote to kill someone. These votes, however, do absolutely nothing and you decide who you kill.
- Choose three marked players during the day. At night, you will learn who they target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- "Town" refers to Town roles, while "town" refers to people you have marked as such. All players except yourself start as being marked as town, and at any time, regardless of the circumstances, you may unmark or remark any player as town, except yourself.
- You may multitask.
